Title: Relates to the disclosure of third-party consumer litigation financing agreements
Summary: Relates to the disclosure of third-party consumer litigation financing agreements in which there is a right to receive compensation or proceeds from the consumer that is contingent on and sourced from any proceeds of the civil action, by settlement, judgment, or otherwise.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to disclosing third-party consumer litigation financing agreements
